original_title: Ang Best Friend ni Paul na si Rico
overview: Paul and Rico have always been together since grade school. They were inseparable. And because of this strong bond, blooms a type of love that is, unfortunately, one-sided. Racing against the clock to tell him before they part ways, Paul is met with revelations that keep him from telling Rico what he truly feels. Can they still be friends? Can they still go back to the way they were before?
tagline: A match made in friendship, unfortunately not as lovers.
title: Paul's Best Friend, Rico
